MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Llanberis and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a secondary fault on the overhead line network. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:21PM on 14th February 2021.
